title: MD
biography: Sun Qiang is a Chinese former professional darts player who played in Professional Darts Corporation (PDC) events.
aiSummary: Sun Qiang is a transplant surgery specialist with an H-index of 94 at Peking Union Medical College Hospital (Member). Has been published in Nature Chemistry, Nature, Catalysis Science & Technology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
